cause.description:
"Pulmonary hypertension is a rare blood vessel disorder of the lung in which the pressure in the pulmonary artery (the blood vessel that leads from the heart to the lungs) rises above normal levels and may become life threatening."--An excerpt from the Pulmonary Hypertension Association website.
1. This disease is devastating and there needs to be a cure so that people diagnosed do not continue to suffer.
2. We need to raise awareness to the community about PH.
3. To learn more about this disease and how you can help, go to www.phassociation.org
4. I am starting this group in memory of a friend who lost her life to PH in June of 2006
cause.mission: Raise awareness about Pulmonary Hypertension and work towards finding a cure!
cause.name: Pulmonary Hypertension Awareness
